sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-channel-view', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, FormsModule], template: `
Channels
#general 12 #development 8 #random 5 #announcements 3
#general
JD
John Doe 2 minutes ago

Hey everyone! How's the project going?

JS
Jane Smith 1 minute ago

Great! We're making good progress on the new features.

MJ
Mike Johnson Just now

I'll have the documentation ready by tomorrow.

`, styles: [] }) export class ChannelViewComponent {}
